titleStmt.title: The speech without doore. Delivered July 9. 1644. in the absence of the speaker, and in the hearing of above 0000003 persons, then present, who unanimously consented to all propositions therein contained, and voted the same fit to be further divulged, as very pertinent to publike welfare.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug:10th 1644 by Geo:Withers.P.Lauerola".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
